<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head>  <meta charset="UTF-8">  <title>ç»„ä»¶é€šä¿¡-çˆ¶å­é€šä¿¡æ¡ˆä¾‹</title></head><body>  <!-- çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ -->  <div id="app">    <cpn :number1='num1' :number2='num2' @num1change="num1Change" @num2change="num2Change"></cpn>    <h2>çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶{{num1}}</h2>    <input type="text" v-model="num1" >    <h2>çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶{{num2}}</h2>    <input type="text" v-model="num2">  </div>  <!-- å­ç»„ä»¶ -->  <template id="cpn">    <div>      <h2>{{number1}}</h2>      <h2>{{dnumber1}}</h2>      <input type="text" :value="dnumber1" @input="num1input">      <h2>{{number2}}</h2>      <input type="text" :value="dnumber2" @input="num2input">    </div>  </template>  <script src="../js/vue.js"></script>  <script>    // çˆ¶ä¼ å­ï¼šprops    const cpn = {      template: "#cpn",      data() {        return {          dnumber1:this.number1,          dnumber2:this.number2        }      },      props:{        number1:[Number,String],        number2:[Number,String],      },      methods: {        num1input(event){          this.dnumber1 = event.target.value          this.$emit('num1change',this.dnumber1)        },        num2input(event){          this.dnumber2 = event.target.value          this.$emit('num2change',this.dnumber2)        }      },    };    const app = new Vue({      el: "#app",      data() {        return {          num1:1,          num2:2,        }      },      methods: {        num1Change(value){          this.num1=value        },        num2Change(value){          this.num1=value        }      },      components: {        cpn      },    })  </script></body></html>

ğŸ”º ä½¿ç”¨watchå®ç°

<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head>  <meta charset="UTF-8">  <title>ç»„ä»¶é€šä¿¡-çˆ¶å­é€šä¿¡æ¡ˆä¾‹(watchå®ç°)</title></head><body>  <!-- çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ -->  <div id="app">    <cpn :number1='num1' :number2='num2' @num1change="num1Change" @num2change="num2Change"></cpn>    <h2>çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶{{num1}}</h2>    <input type="text" v-model="num1" >    <h2>çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶{{num2}}</h2>    <input type="text" v-model="num2">  </div>  <!-- å­ç»„ä»¶ -->  <template id="cpn">    <div>      <h2>{{number1}}</h2>      <input type="text" v-model="dnumber1">      <h2>{{number2}}</h2>      <input type="text" v-model="dnumber2">    </div>  </template>  <script src="../js/vue.js"></script>  <script>    // çˆ¶ä¼ å­ï¼šprops    const cpn = {      template: "#cpn",      data() {        return {          dnumber1:this.number1,          dnumber2:this.number2        }      },      props:{        number1:[Number,String],        number2:[Number,String],      },      watch: {        dnumber1(newValue){          this.dnumber1 = newValue * 100          this.$emit('num1change',newValue)        },        dnumber2(newValue){          this.dnumber1 = newValue * 100          this.$emit('num2change',newValue)        }      },    };    const app = new Vue({      el: "#app",      data() {        return {          num1:1,          num2:2,        }      },      methods: {        num1Change(value){          this.num1=value        },        num2Change(value){          this.num1=value        }      },      components: {        cpn      },    })  </script></body></html>

ğŸ”º çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶è®¿é—®å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œæœ‰æ—¶å€™æˆ‘ä¹ˆä½ éœ€è¦ç›´æ¥æ“ä½œå­ç»„ä»¶çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæˆ–æ˜¯å±æ€§ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶éœ€è¦ç”¨åˆ°$childrenå’Œ$refã€‚

<!-- çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ -->  <div id="app">    <cpn></cpn>    <cpn></cpn>    <cpn ref="aaa"></cpn>    <button @click="btnClick" >æŒ‰é’®</button>  </div>  <!-- å­ç»„ä»¶ -->  <template id="cpn">    <div>      æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶    </div>  </template>  <script src="../js/vue.js"></script>  <script>    // çˆ¶ä¼ å­ï¼šprops    const cpn = {      template: "#cpn",      data() {        return {          name:"æˆ‘æ˜¯å­ç»„ä»¶çš„name"        }      },      methods: {        showMessage(){          console.log("showMessage");        }      },    };    const app = new Vue({      el: "#app",      data() {        return {          message:"hello"        }      },      methods: {        btnClick(){          // 1.children          // console.log(this.$children[0].showMessage)          // for (let cpn of this.$children) {          //   console.log(cpn.showMessage)          // }          // 2.$ref          console.log(this.$refs.aaa.name)        }      },      components: {        cpn      },    })  </script>

ğŸ‘©æ³¨æ„ğŸ‘©: ä½¿ç”¨this.$childrenç›´æ¥è·å–å½“å‰å®ä¾‹çš„ç›´æ¥å­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„$childrenå¹¶ä¸ä¿è¯é¡ºåºï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯å“åº”å¼çš„ã€‚å¦‚æœä½ å‘ç°è‡ªå·±æ­£åœ¨å°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨ $children æ¥è¿›è¡Œæ•°æ®ç»‘å®šï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„é…åˆ v-for æ¥ç”Ÿæˆå­ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä½¿ç”¨Arrayä½œä¸ºçœŸæ­£çš„æ¥æºã€‚
